body: @Jokke0009 stop projecting yourself into Subaru and maybe, just maybe, you'll be less miserable.

netorare is basically the Japanese word for cheating so how do you 'cheat' on someone you're not in a relationship with? You can't so this isn't NTR. It's not even cuckolding because that moron subaru doesn't even accept her and outright rejects her for that bitch emilia. There's no 'why couldn't you do this to me"-type slap in the face when the other person doesn't even _want_ to do it.
